::DrillBit::

DrillBit was hit by the 25 shots, bringing him to one knee.
He stood up, and continued to fire on the Maximals.

::K9::

With two attackers down, K9 ran in to the CF.
"Is there a bot named Kluster here?"

::Hot Rod:: 

Hot Rod continued to fire on the one bot still standing.
